item.title: Introduction to Geographic Information Systems (GIS)
item.author: DR
item.description: GIS (Geographic Information System) is a computer system designed to capture, store, manage, analyze, and display spatially referenced data. It combines geographic data with attribute data, presenting spatial information intuitively through maps, charts, and reports.
